main event: An unidentified flying object was observed in Orville, California on May 20, 1955.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for approximately five seconds., The object was described as round and silver, resembling the size of a silver dollar., The object appeared stationary before fading from sight., The conclusion was that it might be a balloon but there was insufficient data for a proper evaluation., The sighting was classified as a ground-visual observation reported by a civilian.
